question_text: Select two reasons why a technician might prefer an external USB keyboard instead of replacing a faulty internal one immediately.
answer_options: The internal keyboard requires full motherboard replacement
USB keyboards can override BIOS passwords
Internal replacement may void warranty or require disassembly
USB keyboards improve typing accuracy on laptops
External keyboards allow functional testing before teardown
correct_answer: Internal replacement may void warranty or require disassembly
External keyboards allow functional testing before teardown
